name: vitepress-plugin-compression
description: VitePress plugin for packing build folder.
author: manchan4869

scripts.test: npm run build && cd test && npm init -y && npm install -D vitepress && node mkdir.mjs && echo '# Hello VitePress' > docs/index.md && vitepress build docs
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && npm run renameESM
scripts.renameESM: node -e "require('fs').rename('dist/esm/index.js', 'dist/esm/index.mjs', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Build successful!') })"
scripts.publishNPM: npm run build && nrm use npm && npm publish && nrm use taobao
